featureName: Weather Web App with Zipcode Search

epics.title: Core Weather Display
epics.goal: User can enter a zipcode and see current weather conditions
epics.definitionOfDone: User enters zipcode, sees temperature, conditions, and location name

epics.title: Extended Forecast
epics.definitionOfDone: User can view 5-day forecast and hourly breakdown

epics.title: Weather Details
epics.goal: Show detailed weather metrics like humidity, wind, UV index
epics.definitionOfDone: All weather metrics are displayed with proper units

epics.title: Enhanced UX
epics.goal: Polish user experience with loading states, errors, and search history
epics.definitionOfDone: App handles all edge cases gracefully with proper feedback

epics.title: Visual Polish
epics.goal: Add dynamic backgrounds, animations, dark mode, and PWA support
epics.definitionOfDone: App is visually polished and installable as PWA
